position: Serving Notice Period - Decision Science Analyst at HSBC | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Objective: Improving user experience by reducing price shock and surge rates for 2 - wheelers•Reduced price shock between estimated and final fare from 28% to 11% by optimizing multiple input variables for price estimation•Reduced the effect of price shock by 24% by eliminating the effect of error by location providers in calculation of time fare component•Modified surge rate methodology which improved route desirability basis supply-demand mismatch and hotness of hexagonal cluster
experience.description_html: Objective: Improving user experience by reducing price shock and surge rates for 2 - wheelers•Reduced price shock between estimated and final fare from 28% to 11% by optimizing multiple input variables for price estimation•Reduced the effect of price shock by 24% by eliminating the effect of error by location providers in calculation of time fare component•Modified surge rate methodology which improved route desirability basis supply-demand mismatch and hotness of hexagonal cluster <!---->

positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: B-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics, finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house sessions, presentations, hands-on workshops and discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business.
